name: Me, Me & Me (MeMeAndMe)
description:
Me, me & me

A game about time travel

You are locked in a mysterious laboratory.

To escape, you will need your power of temporal multiplication. With more and more version of yourself, will you find the solutions to the rooms?

You can download the executable if you want to fully enjoy the experience (we recommend using the itch.io app)

Join our Discord to be part of it : https://discord.gg/Z2dF4UFq2V

Made by:

  • Baud Alexandre (Me)
  • Jungo Quentin (Me)
  • Philagor Benjamin (Me)

Source: 

We use custom the great following asset: https://petricakegames.itch.io/cosmic-lilac The music were made by: Quentin Jungo    Some sound were custom made and other were taken from the following link: https://opengameart.org/content/8-wet-squish-slurp-impacts https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-sounds-terminal-interaction-door-shot...
